title: Best of The Herd for Aug 26, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Aug 26, 2020
description:
-Colin defends Marcus Morris stepping on Luka Doncic

-Russell Wilson will not end his career in Seattle

-Smart veteran teams like the Lakers and Clippers are taking over in the NBA Playoffs

-The Cowboys worry too much about glamour

-Ben Roethlisberger and the Steelers are not aging well


Guest: Nick Wright, FS1's First Things First


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
